name: 3Db2o
overview:
Goal: To produce 3D content for virtualization for web, interactive and mobile platforms.

Team : The team of 3Db2o combines individual professionals talents with entrepreneur spirit and individual capabilities and useing these talents on projects with flexible and creative working methods to satisfy the client need in the most efficient and fast way.

The name: A combination of 3D and build to order

The business model The service activity is to virtualize in 3D or 360 scenes , environments , objects for web , mobile deployment, 3D content for presentations and virtual online catalogues . Such virtualization can be from simple objects , product concepts , up to shopping malls , concept stores, museums, city environments and more with combined interactivity. 3Db2o can act either as content building company or as full service provider to cover the full process from content sourcing up technical deployment and website integration. 3Db2o offers the full service from content collection , photo shoot , database and catalogue build with 3d design and interactive deployment for web and other platforms and the related project management.

Company history The conclusion out of the experience within 2009 crises was that in someway individual talents needs to be combined to deliver a full range of services either mixed or in a combined offering. 3Db2o is more than just a network it is a company holding talents and capabilities combined to offer the full service to clients to deliver these projects.

Based on that in 2010 3Db2o has been brought to live.

The founders The founders of that company are the Management Team members of 3Db2o.
